content:
/>
XIV.6.4.b
.
Sample Language for Certifying Completion of Corrective Actions
ROs may use language similar to that shown in the paragraph below when preparing the certification referenced in
M21-1, Part XIV, 6.4.a
:
This certifies that all required action has been completed for the
[Insert the date of the list of potential duplicate payment cases.]
review of potential duplicate payment cases for RO
[Enter the RO number.]
.
Questions about the report may be directed as follows:
digits 00-49     Elvis Examiner   (703) 555-1212
digits 50-99     Virginia VSR      (703) 555-1313.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 6 - Review of Potential Duplicate Payment Cases
